verbose_text: To study both neuron and astrocyte function, organoids derived from isogenic APOE3 and APOE4 iPSCs were compared; age- and APOE4 dependent elevations of Abeta and phosphorylated tau were found to corresponded temporally to the appearance of astrocytes, thus indicating the critical importance of APOE to astrocytic function [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: APOE4-dependent elevations of Abeta and phosphorylated tau
